subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: box use concerns.
author: Nellie Kampmann
full_text:
On Wed, Apr 23, 2008 at 10:05 PM, LC Duplatt <lcdupla@...> wrote:
> If people want protection, they should first seek having a healthy
> perspective on life in general, and attempt to have a balanced
> lifestyle. I for one think that would solve most all issues for many
> of us.


Oh, yeah, I definitely think the problem is the personalities involved
and not the box use itself.  I see the same kind of obsession and ego
issues in all different fields, in everything from paranormal research
in general, to our local dance community, to historical reenactment
groups.  No one thinks that dancing or learning about history is
inherently problematic.


Nellie
